Package boundaries

Class StaffUI

java.lang.Object
boundaries.Promptable
boundaries.StaffUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
DateTimeUI, GeneralUI, NumericUI
public class StaffUI
extends Promptable
implements NumericUI, DateTimeUI
UI for Staff users. Meant to abstract staff system from user

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    StaffUI​(java.util.Scanner scn, java.lang.String userId)
    Constructor NOTE: Staff system will not be instantiated and UI will not be activated until run() is called
